articles.author: L.C. Norton
articles.title: Wisconsin’s Greg Gard on OT loss to Indiana: ‘I’ve never seen anything like that’ - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Indiana beat Wisconsin in the closing seconds of overtime following two hotly debated foul calls on the Badgers.
articles.content:
Indiana mens basketball retook the lead over Wisconsin in the closing seconds of overtime to seal a 78-77 win over the Badgers after two late foul calls went against the latter.
The first of the two… [+1170 chars]
